annonstext:
Are you ready to become a part of the Freska family? We are looking for new cleaners to join us in Enköping!

About the position

You will be working in our customers dearest place - their homes!

Therefore we are looking for people who like to build long-lasting customer relationships, enjoy outstanding customer service and solve problems independently. 

As a home cleaner some of your work tasks will include vacuuming, mopping, oven cleaning and dusting. You are organised, punctual, service minded and appreciate that every home and customer is unique!

We want you to be happy with your work!

At Freska you will matter. We highly value the work you do and truly want you to succeed and develop with us. We offer you training in home cleaning, full support from the Freska team and organised hang outs so that you can share experiences and make new memories with your colleagues.

We are looking for you who:

-    Has a positive vibe and an eye for details

-    Speaks Swedish or English

-      Has a valid working permit

What we offer you:

-      A part- time contract from 50 % 📃

-      Collective agreement

-      Paid travel time 

-      Exercises benefit  

-   Organised hang outs with colleagues such as floorball, bowling nights, crayfish parties and much more.

We are looking forward to having you onboard! 

Team Freska
